item.title: Sting - Shape Of My Heart - Ukulele Cheats
item.description: Play along video for the song Shape Of My Heart by Sting from the channel Ukulele Cheats. Chords used in the song: Am, Am7, B, C, D, Em, F♯, F♯7, F♯m, F♯m7, G.

item.title: Dulce Pontes - Lela - Key of Am - Ukeledu Music
item.description: Play along video for the song Lela by Dulce Pontes from the channel Ukeledu Music. Chords used in the song: A7, Am, Amadd9, B, Cmaj7, Dm, E7, F, G7.

item.title: George Harrison - My Sweet Lord - Ukulele Cheats
item.description: Play along video for the song My Sweet Lord by George Harrison from the channel Ukulele Cheats. Chords used in the song: A, B, B7, Bm, C♯7, D, D7, E, Em, F♯dim7, F♯m, G♯dim7.

item.title: "Weird Al" Yankovic - Yoda - Baritone Ukulele - Key of E - ukeplayalongs
item.description: Play along video for the song Yoda by "Weird Al" Yankovic from the channel ukeplayalongs. Chords used in the song: A, AB7, Am, B, B7, C, C♯m, D, E, F♯7.

item.title: Otis Redding - Sittin' On The Dock Of The Bay - Key of G - Cynthia Lin Music
item.description: Play along video for the song Sittin' On The Dock Of The Bay by Otis Redding from the channel Cynthia Lin Music. Chords used in the song: A, B, C, D, E7, F, G.

item.title: Radiohead - Creep - Cynthia Lin Music
item.description: Play along video for the song Creep by Radiohead from the channel Cynthia Lin Music. Chords used in the song: B, C, Cm, G.

item.title: We Wish You A Merry Christmas - Ukulele Play Along - Key of G - Ukulaliens - Ukulele Club

item.description: Play along video for the song Creep by Radiohead from the channel Ukulele Cheats. Chords used in the song: B, C, Cm, G.

item.title: Billy Joel - Just The Way You Are - Ukulele Cheats
item.description: Play along video for the song Just The Way You Are by Billy Joel from the channel Ukulele Cheats. Chords used in the song: A, A7, B, B7, Bm7, D, Dm, Dmaj7, E, Em, Esus4, F, F♯m, F♯m6, G.
